headline: KKR to Present at the 2025 UBS Financial Services Conference
summary: KKR & Co. Inc. announced today that Robert H. Lewin, Chief Financial Officer, will present at the 2025 UBS Financial Services Conference on Monday, February 10, 2025 at 1:50 p.m. ET.A live webcast...

headline: KKR Appoints Guy Metcalfe as Senior Advisor for Global Real Estate
summary: KKR, a leading global investment firm, today announced the appointment of Guy Metcalfe as Senior Advisor. In his role, Mr. Metcalfe will leverage his extensive real estate and capital markets...
